segments.text: I notice the boy precariously balancing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is deep in the cookie jar, and he seems determined to grab as many as possible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I canâ€™t help but feel worried he might fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he stretches toward those cookies, it's almost comical, yet so risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl beside him, her arm raised like she's ready to snatch a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are both so excited, but I wonder if they realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene fills me with a mix of admiration and apprehension.
segments.speaker: PAR
